targets.expr:
sum by (instance) ((1 - sum by (instance, cpu) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_type="workplace",group=~"$group",instance=~"$host",mode="idle"}[1m]))) * on (instance, cpu) avg_over_time(node_cpu_scaling_frequency_hertz[1m])) 
or
(avg by (instance) (1 - sum by (instance, cpu) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_type="workplace",group=~"$group",instance=~"$host",mode="idle"}[1m])))) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_copy((label_copy((system_vmid{host=~"$host"} / on(host,nodename) system_vmid), "host","instance")),"nodename","node")) * on (instance) group_right (node) count by (instance) (node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}) * on (node) group_right(instance) (label_copy((avg by (instance) (node_cpu_scaling_frequency_hertz)), "instance", "node"))

panels.description: CPU = sum by (cores) (core usage * core frequency)
panels.title: Windows

panels.description: CPU = sum by (cores) (core usage * core frequency)

targets.expr: avg_over_time(sum by (instance) ((1 - sum by (instance, cpu) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_type="workplace",group=~"$group",instance=~"$host",mode="idle"}[1m]))) * on (instance, cpu) avg_over_time(node_cpu_scaling_frequency_hertz[1m]))[$interval])

max_over_time(sum by (instance) ((1 - sum by (instance, cpu) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host_type="workplace",group=~"$group",instance=~"$host",mode="idle"}[1m]))) * on (instance, cpu) avg_over_time(node_cpu_scaling_frequency_hertz[1m]))[$interval])
